name: Frog has the TIME MACHINE
description:
Break out of your cage, pick up the TIME MACHINE, and activate the nuke as a frog! Buttons: 

WASD to move.

 J to TIME WARP. 

K to jump and hit buttons and objects.

Note: I made this game in 2-3 days, for the Mini Jam 79. 

What I wanted was to get new eyes on my main project (zombie defense in a farm but melon seeds are your bullet/money/health) and for people to join my discord(discuss my/your work+cat pics). So please:

Follow me on twitter @udcgame

Join me on discord to tell me about my/your work or send cat pics. discord.gg/ZCmPypgEPG

Look at my main game (in alpha1.0), with an overhaul coming soon:

https://udc.itch.io/melon-seeds-zombie-defense

Thank you for your time I hope you like it!
